[bodyguard.GetTitledFirstName] flails ineffectually as the assassin brutally stabs [bodyguard.GetHerHim]! At least [bodyguard.GetSheHe] bought time; [assassin.GetFirstName] is quickly dog-piled by my other guards."

column2: sending [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger clattering across the floor amidst the shrieks of my courtiers – my retinue savagely descend upon [assassin.GetHerHim]..."

column3: and drive my sword between [assassin.GetHerHis] ribs. We are face to face as [assassin.GetHerHis] shock turns to resignation."

but a swift stab sneaks through as I open up to make the killing blow – which lands heavily upon [assassin.GetFirstNamePossessive] head."

column3: drawing blood and falling to the floor
column4: before my guards seize [assassin.GetHerHim] and lift me away."

sword aloft. Our blows land together
column3: and we collapse to the floor together in a mangled scarlet heap."

reveling in the screams of the court

as [assassin.GetFirstName] holds [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger aloft and proclaims: I am now ruler!"""""

hold_court.8240.c0:"There is only one way to settle this."

column1: hold_court.8250.desc0:"The doors are cast open by [vassal_victim.GetTitledFirstName]

column6: ""[yearn_target.GetSheHe|U] has been haunting my dreams for weeks. Please my liege
column7: I don't know what I'll do without [yearn_target.GetHerHim]!"""""

column1: hold_court.8250.b0:"[vassal_jealous.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] shall have [yearn_target.GetHerHim]. That's my final word."

column1: hold_court.8220.desc.liberty0:"stifling my power and contradicting my lawful rulings as [vassal_faction.GetLeader.GetHerHis] [vassal_faction_target.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip]!""

hold_court.8260.c0:"There will be peace in my [ROOT.Char.GetPrimaryTitle.GetTierAsNameNoTooltip]!"

hold_court.8270.desc0:"My heralds announce the arrival of a neighboring petty ruler; [neighbor.GetTitledFirstName] of [neighbor.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier]. \n\n[neighbor.GetSheHe|U] enters your halls with dignity
column4: I have come to humbly pledge my realm to you — if you would accept my terms."" \n\n""I will serve you as a faithful vassal lord of [ROOT.Char.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier] in exchange for your protection; may our two great houses both prosper by the arrangement!"""""

column1: hold_court.8270.b0:"I think these terms are a bit one-sided..."

column6: and each day more of them cross from [nomad.GetTopLiege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier] into my [feudal_county.GetName]."" \n\n""I fear that — if they are not removed — they will soon have settled the entire [feudal_county.GetTierAsNameNoTooltip]!"""""
